About Me

A little bit about me...

BIO

Hi! I am Chi, a web developer and software developer with a keen eye for design. I am currently based in the beautiful city of Seattle, WA. I am passionate about emerging and immersive technology and using it to change the status quo and solve the inefficiencies in our world.
